description: Deep underground, you may find some /b/sparkling deepslate/b/. When mined, these drop a /b/Geode/b/. Geodes can be /6/smashed open/6/ at a /b/workbench/b/ using a /b/hamer/b/.

Geode drops typically include various gemstones, rarely including /b/pristine gemstones/b/. Pristine gemstones have /6/improved stats/6/ when /6/socketed/6/ into tools. They can also be /6/smashed into regular-quality/6/ pieces.
Keep an eye out, these can yield valuable gems.
